00002 #include <iomanip>
00003 #include <assert.h>
00004 using namespace std;

00006 const int U1_UPB = 100; //Upper bound of U1
00007 const int U1_LOB = -100;//Lower bound of U1
00008 const int prt_UPB = 2;  //Upper bound of prt
00009 const int prt_LOB = -1; //Lower bound of prt
00010 
00011 class Qnum_t {
00012         public:
00013                 Qnum_t(): U1(0), prt(0){}
00014                 Qnum_t(int _U1): U1(_U1), prt(0){
00015                         cout<<U1<<endl;
00016                         assert(U1 < U1_UPB && U1 > U1_LOB);
00017                         //cout<<"Constructing Qnum " << this << endl;
00018                 }
00019                 Qnum_t(int _U1, int _prt): U1(_U1), prt(_prt){
00020                         assert(U1 < U1_UPB && U1 > U1_LOB && prt < prt_UPB && prt > prt_LOB);
00021                         //cout<<"Constructing Qnum " << this << endl;
00022                 }
00023 
00024                 Qnum_t(const Qnum_t& _q):U1(_q.U1), prt(_q.prt){
00025                         //cout<<"Copying Qnum " << this << " from " << &_q << endl;
00026                 }
00027                 ~Qnum_t(){
00028                         //cout<<"Destructing Qnum " << this<< endl;
00029                 };
00030                 int getU1(){return U1;}
00031                 int getPrt(){return prt;}
00032                 void set(int _U1 = 0, int _prt = 0);
00033                 friend bool operator< (const Qnum_t& q1, const Qnum_t& q2);
00034                 friend bool operator<= (const Qnum_t& q1, const Qnum_t& q2);
00035                 friend bool operator== (const Qnum_t& q1, const Qnum_t& q2);
00036                 friend Qnum_t operator- (const Qnum_t& q1);
00037                 friend Qnum_t operator* (const Qnum_t& q1, const Qnum_t& q2);
00038                 friend ostream& operator<< (ostream& os, const Qnum_t& q);
00039         private:
00040                 int U1;
00041                 int prt;
